title: OS Level 8 â€” Memory Management & Paging
intro: This level introduces main memory management, logical vs physical address and paging.
points: Understand why memory management is needed and role of OS in it.
Difference between logical (virtual) address and physical address.
Concept of contiguous vs non-contiguous memory allocation.
Introduce paging: page, frame, page table and address translation conceptually.
Know basic fragmentation types: internal and external fragmentation.
